snippet: The country has yet to prove that it is willing to take a leading role in halting the spread of the world’s most lethal weapons.
abstract: Editorial asserts that India should not be granted membership to Nuclear Suppliers Group until it proves itself willing to take leading role in halting spread of nuclear weapons; calls on India to open negotiations with Pakistan and China to end regional nuclear arms race; urges country to sign treaty that prohibits nuclear testing and to stop producing fissile material.
lead_paragraph: The country has yet to prove that it is willing to take a leading role in halting the spread of the world’s most lethal weapons.

headline.main: India’s Role in the Nuclear Race
